Text.Page:
One naga in particular is laying the groundwork for reviving Dagon.

You probably guess where I'm going with this. And I'd hate to disappoint you. Your target is {@LinkCreature:10#19#Siraxatol}. Take her out.

We're inside the nagas' reaction cycle now, giving them new things to worry about before they've dealt with the last batch of troubles.

And we have you and your quick work to thank for that, .
